page.topic: Turn Ajax On/Off in Grid Components
page.description: Bulk operation to enable or disable Ajax in all Grid Components. This operation should only be used to upgrade Grid Components built using Alpha Five Version 9 or older.

discussion.p: In order to use most features in Alpha Anywhere, you must enable Ajax in every Grid component created in Alpha Anywhere Version 9 or older. To enable Ajax in a Grid component, you must check the '*[ui:Ajax Enabled]*' checkbox in the Grid component's properties.
The *[ui:Turn Ajax On/Off in Grid Components]* bulk operation will enable (or disable) Ajax in every Grid Component in your project.

section.title: How to Enable Ajax in Grid Components using the Turn Ajax On/Off in Grid Components Bulk Operation

step.description: Open the Web Projects Control Panel and select *[ui:Bulk Operations]* > *[ui:Turn Ajax On/Off in Grid Components...]* from the *[ui:Edit]* menu:
Select *[ui:Turn Ajax On]* and click *[ui:OK]* to perform the bulk operation.
